thread.title: During his signing day press conference, head coach Matt Cam
thread.title_full: During his signing day press conference, head coach Matt Cam

author: rivals.com
title: During his signing day press conference, head coach Matt Cam
text:
During his signing day press conference, head coach Matt Campbell reiterated that getting recruits on campus for visits is a huge key to getting them to be Cyclones. One linebacker the staff would love to have in Ames during the coming months is a standout from the state of Ohio.
Chardon junior standout Chase Kline , who has had an offer from the Cyclones for several months and went on to add another from Syracuse, said the Cyclone coaches are doing their best to get him on campus in the near future.
Since picking up the offer, the 6-foot-3, 225-pound Kline has done some homework on the program and likes what he’s seen.
In addition to his two offers, Kline said he’s heard the most from Ohio State, Notre Dame and Vanderbilt. He took a Junior Day visit to Ohio State recently and believes it may be close to offering.
For more on Kline's recruitment and how the Cyclones up at this stage of the process, check out a more-detailed story on the ISU Confidential message board.
